posts.post_title: All Moved to Ebay --- Please Delete Post
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian Lindholme
Turner, 

We've done a few of these T205 deals in the past.
I already have the raw base set, but I'm always looking for a few SGC's I don't have...maybe set two stands a chance!

I'd be interested in buying the last 3 (McBride, Stovall + Bescher) if you break the lot.
Please go ahead with your 7 card offering to the BST if it's best for you...its not the highest priority to me.

THANKS!
Brian L
familytoad
Ridgefield, WA
